nop		0000000000000000
setc		0000000000001000
clrc		0000000000010000

not rd		001000rd0000000
dec rd		001000rd0001000
inc rd		001000rd0010000

mov rs,rd	001rsrd0011000
add rs,rd	001rsrd0100000
sub rs,rd	001rsrd0101000
and rs,rd	001rsrd0110000
or rs,rd	001rsrd0111000

in rd		001000rd0011010
out rs		001rs0000011100

shl rd,imm	001imm[0:3]rd1000imm[3:]0
shr rd,imm	001imm[0:3]rd1001imm[3:]0

mul rs, rd	001rsrd0000100
		001rdrs0001100

push rs		011000rs0000000
pop rd		011000rd0100000

ldm rd,imm	1000imm[14:]rd0000000
		1imm[0:14]1

ldd rd,ea	101ea[14:17]rdea[17:20]0000
		1ea[0:14]1
std rs,ea	110ea[14:17]rsea[17:20]0000
		1ea[0:14]1

jz rs		000000rs1000000
jn rs		000000rs1001000
jc rs 		000000rs1010000
jmp rs		000000rs1011000
call rs		111100rs1000000
ret		1110000001100000
rti		1110100001100000
